	<item>
		<title>Volume of 2016 Presidential Campaign Advertising More Than Double 2012 Number</title>
		<link>http://blogs.wsj.com/washwire/2016/05/12/volume-of-2016-presidential-campaign-advertising-more-than-double-2012/?mod=WSJ_Politics%20and%20Policy</link>
		<comments>http://blogs.wsj.com/washwire/2016/05/12/volume-of-2016-presidential-campaign-advertising-more-than-double-2012/#comments</comments>
		<pubDate>Thu, 12 May 2016 19:30:20 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[Rebecca Ballhaus]]></dc:creator>
				<category><![CDATA[Global]]></category>
		<category><![CDATA[Democrats]]></category>
		<category><![CDATA[Election 2016]]></category>
		<category><![CDATA[Republicans]]></category>
		<category><![CDATA[Television advertising]]></category>

		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://blogs.wsj.com/washwire/?p=63226</guid>
		<description><![CDATA[If voters thought they were over-saturated with political ads in 2012, they're really not going to like 2016: the volume of television advertising in this presidential election is up 122% over the same period in 2012, according to a new report.]]></description>
		<wfw:commentRss>http://blogs.wsj.com/washwire/2016/05/12/volume-of-2016-presidential-campaign-advertising-more-than-double-2012/feed/</wfw:commentRss>
		<slash:comments>0</slash:comments>
	<media:group><media:content url="//si.wsj.net/public/resources/images/BN-NY978_MER051_A_20160511080008.jpg" type="image/jpg" medium="image" /><media:content url="//si.wsj.net/public/resources/images/BN-NY978_MER051_C_20160511080008.jpg" type="image/jpg" medium="image" /><media:content url="//si.wsj.net/public/resources/images/BN-NY978_MER051_D_20160511080008.jpg" type="image/jpg" medium="image" /><media:content url="//si.wsj.net/public/resources/images/BN-NY978_MER051_E_20160511080008.jpg" type="image/jpg" medium="image" /><media:content url="//si.wsj.net/public/resources/images/BN-NY978_MER051_F_20160511080008.jpg" type="image/jpg" medium="image" /><media:content url="//si.wsj.net/public/resources/images/BN-NY978_MER051_G_20160511080008.jpg" type="image/jpg" medium="image" /><media:content url="//si.wsj.net/public/resources/images/BN-NY978_MER051_P_20160511080008.jpg" type="image/jpg" medium="image" /><media:content url="//si.wsj.net/public/resources/images/BN-NY978_MER051_J_20160511080008.jpg" type="image/jpg" medium="image" /><media:content url="//si.wsj.net/public/resources/images/BN-NY978_MER051_M_20160511080008.jpg" type="image/jpg" medium="image" /><media:content url="//si.wsj.net/public/resources/images/BN-NY978_MER051_ER_20160511080008.jpg" type="image/jpg" medium="image" /><media:content url="//si.wsj.net/public/resources/images/BN-NY978_MER051_FR_20160511080008.jpg" type="image/jpg" medium="image" /><media:content url="//si.wsj.net/public/resources/images/BN-NY978_MER051_GR_20160511080008.jpg" type="image/jpg" medium="image" /><media:content url="//si.wsj.net/public/resources/images/BN-NY978_MER051_AM_20160511080008.jpg" type="image/jpg" medium="image" /></media:group>	</item>
		<item>
		<title>Lindsey Graham: I Had a ‘Cordial, Funny’ Phone Call With Donald Trump</title>
		<link>http://blogs.wsj.com/washwire/2016/05/12/lindsey-graham-i-had-a-cordial-funny-phone-call-with-donald-trump/?mod=WSJ_Politics%20and%20Policy</link>
		<comments>http://blogs.wsj.com/washwire/2016/05/12/lindsey-graham-i-had-a-cordial-funny-phone-call-with-donald-trump/#comments</comments>
		<pubDate>Thu, 12 May 2016 19:09:22 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[Janet Hook]]></dc:creator>
				<category><![CDATA[Election 2016]]></category>
		<category><![CDATA[Donald Trump]]></category>
		<category><![CDATA[Lindsey Graham]]></category>
		<category><![CDATA[Republicans]]></category>

		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://blogs.wsj.com/washwire/?p=63224</guid>
		<description><![CDATA[Sen. Lindsey Graham, Donald Trump's erstwhile presidential rival and one of his most vociferous critics, said the the two had a 15-minute phone call Wednesday because the front-runner wanted to “pick my brain about national security.”

]]></description>
		<wfw:commentRss>http://blogs.wsj.com/washwire/2016/05/12/lindsey-graham-i-had-a-cordial-funny-phone-call-with-donald-trump/feed/</wfw:commentRss>
		<slash:comments>0</slash:comments>
	<media:group><media:content url="http://si.wsj.net/public/resources/images/BN-JH231_GRAHAM_D_20150708120404.jpg" type="image/jpg" medium="image" /><media:content url="http://si.wsj.net/public/resources/images/BN-JH231_GRAHAM_E_20150708120404.jpg" type="image/jpg" medium="image" /><media:content url="http://si.wsj.net/public/resources/images/BN-JH231_GRAHAM_F_20150708120404.jpg" type="image/jpg" medium="image" /><media:content url="http://si.wsj.net/public/resources/images/BN-JH231_GRAHAM_G_20150708120404.jpg" type="image/jpg" medium="image" /><media:content url="http://si.wsj.net/public/resources/images/BN-JH231_GRAHAM_P_20150708120404.jpg" type="image/jpg" medium="image" /><media:content url="http://si.wsj.net/public/resources/images/BN-JH231_GRAHAM_M_20150708120404.jpg" type="image/jpg" medium="image" /></media:group>	</item>
		<item>
		<title>What Donald Trump’s Tax Returns Could Show About His Finances</title>
		<link>http://blogs.wsj.com/washwire/2016/05/12/what-donald-trumps-tax-returns-could-show-about-his-finances/?mod=WSJ_Politics%20and%20Policy</link>
		<comments>http://blogs.wsj.com/washwire/2016/05/12/what-donald-trumps-tax-returns-could-show-about-his-finances/#comments</comments>
		<pubDate>Thu, 12 May 2016 17:11:55 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[Richard Rubin]]></dc:creator>
				<category><![CDATA[Election 2016]]></category>
		<category><![CDATA[Donald Trump]]></category>
		<category><![CDATA[Republicans]]></category>

		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://blogs.wsj.com/washwire/?p=63221</guid>
		<description><![CDATA[Donald Trump said this week that there’s “nothing to learn” from looking at his tax returns. In fact, there is plenty voters could glean from reviewing the stacks of paper with which Mr. Trump posed last year when he signed his return.]]></description>
		<wfw:commentRss>http://blogs.wsj.com/washwire/2016/05/12/what-donald-trumps-tax-returns-could-show-about-his-finances/feed/</wfw:commentRss>
		<slash:comments>0</slash:comments>
	<media:group><media:content url="//si.wsj.net/public/resources/images/BN-NZ322_TRUMPT_A_20160511165342.jpg" type="image/jpg" medium="image" /><media:content url="//si.wsj.net/public/resources/images/BN-NZ322_TRUMPT_C_20160511165342.jpg" type="image/jpg" medium="image" /><media:content url="//si.wsj.net/public/resources/images/BN-NZ322_TRUMPT_D_20160511165342.jpg" type="image/jpg" medium="image" /><media:content url="//si.wsj.net/public/resources/images/BN-NZ322_TRUMPT_E_20160511165342.jpg" type="image/jpg" medium="image" /><media:content url="//si.wsj.net/public/resources/images/BN-NZ322_TRUMPT_F_20160511165342.jpg" type="image/jpg" medium="image" /><media:content url="//si.wsj.net/public/resources/images/BN-NZ322_TRUMPT_G_20160511165342.jpg" type="image/jpg" medium="image" /><media:content url="//si.wsj.net/public/resources/images/BN-NZ322_TRUMPT_P_20160511165342.jpg" type="image/jpg" medium="image" /><media:content url="//si.wsj.net/public/resources/images/BN-NZ322_TRUMPT_J_20160511165342.jpg" type="image/jpg" medium="image" /><media:content url="//si.wsj.net/public/resources/images/BN-NZ322_TRUMPT_M_20160511165342.jpg" type="image/jpg" medium="image" /><media:content url="//si.wsj.net/public/resources/images/BN-NZ322_TRUMPT_ER_20160511165342.jpg" type="image/jpg" medium="image" /><media:content url="//si.wsj.net/public/resources/images/BN-NZ322_TRUMPT_FR_20160511165342.jpg" type="image/jpg" medium="image" /><media:content url="//si.wsj.net/public/resources/images/BN-NZ322_TRUMPT_GR_20160511165342.jpg" type="image/jpg" medium="image" /><media:content url="//si.wsj.net/public/resources/images/BN-NZ322_TRUMPT_AM_20160511165342.jpg" type="image/jpg" medium="image" /></media:group>	</item>
		<item>
		<title>John Boehner Says Paul Ryan ‘Just Being Cautious’ on Donald Trump</title>
		<link>http://blogs.wsj.com/washwire/2016/05/12/john-boehner-defends-paul-ryan-dings-ted-cruz-again/?mod=WSJ_Politics%20and%20Policy</link>
		<comments>http://blogs.wsj.com/washwire/2016/05/12/john-boehner-defends-paul-ryan-dings-ted-cruz-again/#comments</comments>
		<pubDate>Thu, 12 May 2016 16:56:22 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[Rebecca Ballhaus]]></dc:creator>
				<category><![CDATA[Election 2016]]></category>
		<category><![CDATA[Donald Trump]]></category>
		<category><![CDATA[John Boehner]]></category>
		<category><![CDATA[Paul Ryan]]></category>
		<category><![CDATA[Ted Cruz]]></category>

		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://blogs.wsj.com/washwire/?p=63219</guid>
		<description><![CDATA[Former House Speaker John Boehner defended successor Paul Ryan’s move not to readily endorse presumptive GOP nominee Donald Trump, took another jab at Texas Sen. Ted Cruz and said he sees party unity and a Trump victory come November.]]></description>
		<wfw:commentRss>http://blogs.wsj.com/washwire/2016/05/12/john-boehner-defends-paul-ryan-dings-ted-cruz-again/feed/</wfw:commentRss>
		<slash:comments>0</slash:comments>
	<media:group><media:content url="//si.wsj.net/public/resources/images/BN-NZ711_Boehne_A_20160512140845.jpg" type="image/jpg" medium="image" /><media:content url="//si.wsj.net/public/resources/images/BN-NZ711_Boehne_C_20160512140845.jpg" type="image/jpg" medium="image" /><media:content url="//si.wsj.net/public/resources/images/BN-NZ711_Boehne_D_20160512140845.jpg" type="image/jpg" medium="image" /><media:content url="//si.wsj.net/public/resources/images/BN-NZ711_Boehne_E_20160512140845.jpg" type="image/jpg" medium="image" /><media:content url="//si.wsj.net/public/resources/images/BN-NZ711_Boehne_F_20160512140845.jpg" type="image/jpg" medium="image" /><media:content url="//si.wsj.net/public/resources/images/BN-NZ711_Boehne_G_20160512140845.jpg" type="image/jpg" medium="image" /><media:content url="//si.wsj.net/public/resources/images/BN-NZ711_Boehne_P_20160512140845.jpg" type="image/jpg" medium="image" /><media:content url="//si.wsj.net/public/resources/images/BN-NZ711_Boehne_J_20160512140845.jpg" type="image/jpg" medium="image" /><media:content url="//si.wsj.net/public/resources/images/BN-NZ711_Boehne_M_20160512140845.jpg" type="image/jpg" medium="image" /><media:content url="//si.wsj.net/public/resources/images/BN-NZ711_Boehne_ER_20160512140845.jpg" type="image/jpg" medium="image" /><media:content url="//si.wsj.net/public/resources/images/BN-NZ711_Boehne_FR_20160512140845.jpg" type="image/jpg" medium="image" /><media:content url="//si.wsj.net/public/resources/images/BN-NZ711_Boehne_GR_20160512140845.jpg" type="image/jpg" medium="image" /><media:content url="//si.wsj.net/public/resources/images/BN-NZ711_Boehne_AM_20160512140845.jpg" type="image/jpg" medium="image" /></media:group>	</item>
		<item>
		<title>Paul Ryan’s Chance to Move Donald Trump on Entitlement Reform</title>
		<link>http://blogs.wsj.com/washwire/2016/05/12/paul-ryans-chance-to-move-donald-trump-on-entitlement-reform/?mod=WSJ_Politics%20and%20Policy</link>
		<comments>http://blogs.wsj.com/washwire/2016/05/12/paul-ryans-chance-to-move-donald-trump-on-entitlement-reform/#comments</comments>
		<pubDate>Thu, 12 May 2016 15:54:20 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[Maya MacGuineas]]></dc:creator>
				<category><![CDATA[Think Tank]]></category>

		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://blogs.wsj.com/washwire/?p=63216</guid>
		<description><![CDATA[Maya MacGuineas on why she hopes Paul Ryan encouraged Donald Trump to pursue entitlement reform at their meeting Thursday.]]></description>
		<wfw:commentRss>http://blogs.wsj.com/washwire/2016/05/12/paul-ryans-chance-to-move-donald-trump-on-entitlement-reform/feed/</wfw:commentRss>

		<item>
		<title>If Elected, What Happens When President Trump’s Taxes Gets Audited?</title>
		<link>http://blogs.wsj.com/washwire/2016/05/12/if-elected-what-happens-when-president-trumps-taxes-gets-audited/?mod=WSJ_Politics%20and%20Policy</link>
		<comments>http://blogs.wsj.com/washwire/2016/05/12/if-elected-what-happens-when-president-trumps-taxes-gets-audited/#comments</comments>
		<pubDate>Thu, 12 May 2016 15:26:33 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[David J. Herzig]]></dc:creator>
				<category><![CDATA[Think Tank]]></category>
		<category><![CDATA[David J. Herzig]]></category>
		<category><![CDATA[Donald Trump]]></category>
		<category><![CDATA[IRS]]></category>
		<category><![CDATA[Tax Returns]]></category>
		<category><![CDATA[Taxes]]></category>

		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://blogs.wsj.com/washwire/?p=63217</guid>
		<description><![CDATA[David J. Herzig: If Donald Trump is elected president, as the head of the executive branch he has control over its agencies, which include the IRS and the Tax Court. Technically, he would have the power to stop audits of his returns. ]]></description>
		<wfw:commentRss>http://blogs.wsj.com/washwire/2016/05/12/if-elected-what-happens-when-president-trumps-taxes-gets-audited/feed/</wfw:commentRss>
		<slash:comments>0</slash:comments>
	<media:group><media:content url="//si.wsj.net/public/resources/images/BN-NY320_TRUMPD_A_20160509171708.jpg" type="image/jpg" medium="image" /><media:content url="//si.wsj.net/public/resources/images/BN-NY320_TRUMPD_C_20160509171708.jpg" type="image/jpg" medium="image" /><media:content url="//si.wsj.net/public/resources/images/BN-NY320_TRUMPD_D_20160509171708.jpg" type="image/jpg" medium="image" /><media:content url="//si.wsj.net/public/resources/images/BN-NY320_TRUMPD_E_20160509171708.jpg" type="image/jpg" medium="image" /><media:content url="//si.wsj.net/public/resources/images/BN-NY320_TRUMPD_F_20160509171708.jpg" type="image/jpg" medium="image" /><media:content url="//si.wsj.net/public/resources/images/BN-NY320_TRUMPD_G_20160509171708.jpg" type="image/jpg" medium="image" /><media:content url="//si.wsj.net/public/resources/images/BN-NY320_TRUMPD_P_20160509171708.jpg" type="image/jpg" medium="image" /><media:content url="//si.wsj.net/public/resources/images/BN-NY320_TRUMPD_J_20160509171708.jpg" type="image/jpg" medium="image" /><media:content url="//si.wsj.net/public/resources/images/BN-NY320_TRUMPD_M_20160509171708.jpg" type="image/jpg" medium="image" /><media:content url="//si.wsj.net/public/resources/images/BN-NY320_TRUMPD_ER_20160509171708.jpg" type="image/jpg" medium="image" /><media:content url="//si.wsj.net/public/resources/images/BN-NY320_TRUMPD_FR_20160509171708.jpg" type="image/jpg" medium="image" /><media:content url="//si.wsj.net/public/resources/images/BN-NY320_TRUMPD_GR_20160509171708.jpg" type="image/jpg" medium="image" /><media:content url="//si.wsj.net/public/resources/images/BN-NY320_TRUMPD_AM_20160509171708.jpg" type="image/jpg" medium="image" /></media:group>	</item>
		<item>
		<title>Full Text of Statement by Paul Ryan and Donald Trump</title>
		<link>http://blogs.wsj.com/washwire/2016/05/12/full-text-of-statement-by-paul-ryan-and-donald-trump/?mod=WSJ_Politics%20and%20Policy</link>
		<comments>http://blogs.wsj.com/washwire/2016/05/12/full-text-of-statement-by-paul-ryan-and-donald-trump/#comments</comments>
		<pubDate>Thu, 12 May 2016 15:16:53 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[Natalie Andrews]]></dc:creator>
				<category><![CDATA[Election 2016]]></category>
		<category><![CDATA[Donald Trump]]></category>
		<category><![CDATA[Endorsements]]></category>
		<category><![CDATA[Paul Ryan]]></category>
		<category><![CDATA[Republicans]]></category>

		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://blogs.wsj.com/washwire/?p=63218</guid>
		<description><![CDATA[After meeting Thursday in Washington, House Speaker Paul Ryan and presumptive GOP nominee Donald Trump issued a joint statement. Here is the full text.]]></description>
		<wfw:commentRss>http://blogs.wsj.com/washwire/2016/05/12/full-text-of-statement-by-paul-ryan-and-donald-trump/feed/</wfw:commentRss>
		<slash:comments>0</slash:comments>
	<media:group><media:content url="//si.wsj.net/public/resources/images/BN-NZ576_0512tr_A_20160512100525.jpg" type="image/jpg" medium="image" /><media:content url="//si.wsj.net/public/resources/images/BN-NZ576_0512tr_C_20160512100525.jpg" type="image/jpg" medium="image" /><media:content url="//si.wsj.net/public/resources/images/BN-NZ576_0512tr_D_20160512100525.jpg" type="image/jpg" medium="image" /><media:content url="//si.wsj.net/public/resources/images/BN-NZ576_0512tr_E_20160512100525.jpg" type="image/jpg" medium="image" /><media:content url="//si.wsj.net/public/resources/images/BN-NZ576_0512tr_F_20160512100525.jpg" type="image/jpg" medium="image" /><media:content url="//si.wsj.net/public/resources/images/BN-NZ576_0512tr_G_20160512100525.jpg" type="image/jpg" medium="image" /><media:content url="//si.wsj.net/public/resources/images/BN-NZ576_0512tr_P_20160512100525.jpg" type="image/jpg" medium="image" /><media:content url="//si.wsj.net/public/resources/images/BN-NZ576_0512tr_J_20160512100525.jpg" type="image/jpg" medium="image" /><media:content url="//si.wsj.net/public/resources/images/BN-NZ576_0512tr_M_20160512100525.jpg" type="image/jpg" medium="image" /><media:content url="//si.wsj.net/public/resources/images/BN-NZ576_0512tr_ER_20160512100525.jpg" type="image/jpg" medium="image" /><media:content url="//si.wsj.net/public/resources/images/BN-NZ576_0512tr_FR_20160512100525.jpg" type="image/jpg" medium="image" /><media:content url="//si.wsj.net/public/resources/images/BN-NZ576_0512tr_GR_20160512100525.jpg" type="image/jpg" medium="image" /><media:content url="//si.wsj.net/public/resources/images/BN-NZ576_0512tr_AM_20160512100525.jpg" type="image/jpg" medium="image" /></media:group>	</item>
		<item>
		<title>Bernie Sanders’s Longevity on Campaign Trail Surprises the Senate</title>
		<link>http://blogs.wsj.com/washwire/2016/05/12/bernie-sanderss-longevity-on-campaign-trail-surprises-the-senate/?mod=WSJ_Politics%20and%20Policy</link>
		<comments>http://blogs.wsj.com/washwire/2016/05/12/bernie-sanderss-longevity-on-campaign-trail-surprises-the-senate/#comments</comments>
		<pubDate>Thu, 12 May 2016 08:00:56 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[Kristina Peterson]]></dc:creator>
				<category><![CDATA[Election 2016]]></category>
		<category><![CDATA[Bernie Sanders]]></category>
		<category><![CDATA[U.S. Senate]]></category>

		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://blogs.wsj.com/washwire/?p=63212</guid>
		<description><![CDATA[One year ago, few members of the Senate would have predicted that Sen. Bernie Sanders would be the last of five senators to remain in the final stretches of a presidential primary.]]></description>
		<wfw:commentRss>http://blogs.wsj.com/washwire/2016/05/12/bernie-sanderss-longevity-on-campaign-trail-surprises-the-senate/feed/</wfw:commentRss>
		<slash:comments>0</slash:comments>
